publicationStmt.publisher: "Maryland, Register of Wills Records, 1629-1999." Images. FamilySearch. http://FamilySearch.org: 3 December 2024. Citing Prerogative Court. Hall of Records, Annapolis.

div.head: Thomas King Will
div.p:
1st In the name of God Amen. I Thomas King of Charles County
in the province of Maryland being very sick and weake in body but blessed
be the Lord having my perfect sence and memory doe make here my
last will and testament. First I do give and bequeath unto Almighty my
soule that made it and my body to a Christian burial and all my wordly
goods as followeth after my Debts be satisfied.

2nd I doe give and bequeath unto my wifes Eldest D after Elizabeth Jones two
mares and four caves.
